DOC.brief_summary: This study will treat approximately 24 participants who experience cold sores. Patches will be applied to the cold sore for up to ten days, and the symptoms will be measured during daily clinic visits using non-invasive measurement techniques.
DOC.brief_title: An Exploratory Study to Investigate the Inflammatory Response During a Cold Sore Episode
DOC.criteria: Participants who are susceptible to cold sores that reactivate when exposed to ultraviolet (UV) light
